shared.tester

Interface TestMetric

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccuracyTestMetric, ConfusionMatrixTestMetric, RawOutputTestMetric

    public interface TestMetric
    This interface defines an API for test metrics. Test metrics are notified by the Tester after an instance is tested by the classifier. The test metrics are given a chance to compare the results and accumulate statics or measurements of error. These data can then be printed in a human readable format.
    Author:
    Jesse Rosalia (https://www.github.com/theJenix)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addResult(Instance expected, Instance actual)
      Add a test result to the metric.
      void printResults()
      Print the values collected by this test metric.

    • Method Detail

      • addResult

        void addResult(Instance expected,
             Instance actual)
        Add a test result to the metric. The metric will compare the values and accumulate what data it needs.
        Parameters:
        expected - The expected value (from the training set)
        actual - The value produced by the classifier.

      • printResults

        void printResults()
        Print the values collected by this test metric.
